hints.text: 🥛 I give you milk.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🌾 I eat grass in the field.

animal.question: I go 'Woof! Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I guard your house.
🎾 I like to play fetch.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk from a bowl.
😴 I like to take naps in sunny spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and grey.
🚿 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I waddle and say 'Quack!'. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I like to swim in ponds.
🌧️ I don't mind the rain.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I am a big cat with a loud roar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am the king of the jungle.
👑 I have a big mane around my head.
🐾 I hunt for food.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐇 I can be white or brown.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🍃 I eat leaves from the top of trees.

animal.question: I am a black and white striped horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
⬛ My stripes help me hide from predators.
🌿 I eat grass.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🌴 I am very good at climbing.
🍌 I make funny noises.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I make it warm.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
🧤 You wear gloves when I am here.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them dance. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🍃 I move the leaves on the trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am gray and full of water, and I cover the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am fluffy and white, or sometimes dark.
🌧️ Rain comes from me.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am curved in the sky.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet.
☀️ You can sometimes see me when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am very loud and bright, and I come with thunderstorms. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come with a flash of light.
⛈️ You can hear me roar!
☔ Stay inside when I'm around!

weather.question: I am small and hard and icy, and I fall from the sky like rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
🥶 I fall during a storm.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can pick things up.
🏠 I can damage houses.
🌀 Get to safety when I come!

weather.question: I am very warm. I tell you how hot or cold it is outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ Numbers are on me.
🌞 I tell you if it is warm enough for a swim.
🧤 I help you know if it is cold enough for gloves.
